name: The Best Vegan Baked Beans
description: Introducing the most delicious vegan baked beans in the world! The secret to quick and easy baked beans? Canned beans, of course! Sure to be a hit at any barbecue.
recipeIngredient: (4) 15-ounce cans small navy beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, warm the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and stir for about 5 minutes, until soft. Then add the garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pot, warm the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and stir for about 5 minutes, until soft. Then add the garlic and cook for 1 more minute.

recipeInstructions.text: To the pot, add the molasses, brown sugar, ketchup, salt, apple cider vinegar, vegan Worcestershire sauce and Sriracha hot sauce. Stir well, then add the drained and rinsed beans.
recipeInstructions.name: To the pot, add the molasses, brown sugar, ketchup, salt, apple cider vinegar, vegan Worcestershire sauce and Sriracha hot sauce. Stir well, then add the drained and rinsed beans.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a large casserole dish (I used a 9 x 13 inch dish) and cover with foil. Bake for 1 hour. The sauce should thicken a bit.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a large casserole dish (I used a 9 x 13 inch dish) and cover with foil. Bake for 1 hour. The sauce should thicken a bit.

recipeInstructions.text: Keep warm until ready to serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep warm until ready to serve.

keywords: baked beans recipe, vegan baked beans, vegetarian baked beans
